title: ICurveDrivenPatternFeatureData.FeatureScope
description: Gets which bodies in this multibody part are affected by this curve-driven pattern feature.
returns: True to specify affected bodies, false to apply the pattern to all bodies every time the feature regenerates
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ICurveDrivenPatternFeatureData::GeometryPattern
is true.
Call
ICurveDrivenPatternFeatureData::SetFeatureScope
to set this property.
For more information, see the
Curve Driven Patterns and the
Curve Driven Pattern PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
